body:
SELECT
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0017]/value as T0_hyperlipidemia,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0018]/value as T0_hypercholesterolemia,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0019]/value as T0_hyperbetalipoproteinemia,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0020]/value as T0_hyperlipoproteinemia,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0021]/value as T0_myocardial_infarction,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0022]/value as T0_hypertriglyceridemia,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0023]/value as T0_tendon_xanthomatosis,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0016]/items[at0030]/items[at0024]/value as T0_corneal_arcus,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0035]/value as T0_total_cholesterol_6_7_mmol,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0036]/value as T0_ldl_cholesterol_above_4_0,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0037]/value as T0_total_cholesterol_7_5_mmol_l,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0038]/value as T0_ldl_cholesterol_above_4_9,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0039]/value as T0_tendon_xanthomas_tx_in,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0040]/value as T0_tendon_xanthomas_tx_in_1st,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0041]/value as T0_total_cholesterol_8_5_mmol_l,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0042]/value as T0_ldl_cholesterol_above_5_5,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0043]/value as T0_family_history_of_myocardial,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0044]/value as T0_family_history_of_raised,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0032]/items[at0034]/items[at0033]/items[at0045]/value as T0_polygenic_risk_12_snp_gene,
  a/data[at0001]/events[at0002]/data[at0003]/items[at0055]/value as T0_assessment
FROM
  EHR e CONTAINS COMPOSITION c CONTAINS (
    OBSERVATION a[openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.ni_100k_genomes_project.v0]
  )
LIMIT
  1
ORDER BY
  c/context/start_time/value DESC
